DataElement.preferredName: Medical Device Availability Evaluation Flag Short Text
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Text to describe a medical device's availability for evaluation.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Medical Device Product Material Availability Evaluation Flag
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Any physical object that is useful for prevention, diagnosis, monitoring, or treatment of disease or other conditions.:The end result of a manufacturing process; anything that is produced.:The tangible substance that goes into the makeup of a physical object._The quality of being obtainable or accessible and ready for use or service.:Systematic, objective appraisal of the significance, effectiveness, and impact of activities or condition according to specified objectives and criteria.:An indicator that can be set or unset in order to signal whether a particular condition is true.
